channel.title: life on J A C K
channel.description: Recent content in life on J A C K

item.title: The Simplest Espresso
item.description: Espresso is a meditative experience. It’s as much about understanding fluid dynamics as practicing precise handiwork.

item.title: 2 Minute Intro to Coffee
item.description: Coffee is alchemy. A hobby that combines art, science, and just the right amount of voodoo.

item.title: Shipping as a habit
item.description: I’ve worked on a lot of projects (3d printing, grooming habits, video calling), but don’t publish enough.

item.title: Using Notes as an Outer Brain
item.description: I take a lot of notes but don’t make use of them.

item.title: The One Habit Way
item.description: After burning through a ton of habit apps, I felt like most of them “miss the point”.

item.title: Packing less is good for my soul
item.description: For the past 5 years, I’ve moved every 4 months. It’s taken time, but I’ve changed from a hoarder (the way of my people) to someone who wants very little.

item.title: Sunshine for 3 winters in a row
item.description: I have a great view of the grey tarmac and overcast sky from my seat on the turboprop.

item.title: It's hard to get used to losing things
item.description: Those of us that don’t pay attention to history are doomed to repeat it.

item.title: Culture shock is real if you take yourself far enough
item.description: Now I know a little more about making jumps and taking hard landings.
